questions: Describe a holiday you really enjoyed.
Tell me about a time you helped someone.
What’s your opinion about using mobile phones in class?

What do you usually do on your birthday?
Describe your favorite type of music and why.
Tell me about a book or film that you liked.
What do you usually do when you travel?
Do you prefer going to the cinema or watching films at home?
Tell me about your future plans.
What is the most interesting place you have visited?
Do you prefer summer or winter holidays? Why?
What’s your opinion about fast food?
Tell me about a teacher who influenced you.
Do you prefer living in the city or the countryside? Why?
What do you usually do when you are with your friends?
What are the advantages of learning English?
Describe a famous person you admire.
Do you like cooking? Why or why not?
Tell me about something you learned recently.
Do you prefer online shopping or going to shops?
What do you do to relax?
What is your favorite festival?
What’s your opinion about keeping pets?
tips: Speak clearly and for about 60 seconds.
